concept.title: Directory
concept.shortdesc: The Directory origin reads data from files in a directory.

conbody.p: Directory originovervieworiginsDirectoryDirectory reads the files in a directory with names that match a user-defined pattern. It can optionally begin processing with a specific file name. Then, it reads files with similar names in naturally ascending order. After processing a file, Directory can keep, archive, or delete the file.

When the pipeline stops, Directory notes where it stopped reading. When the pipeline starts again, by default, Directory continues processing from where it left off. You can reset the origin to process all specified files.
